short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to search for coupons & deals. Get them right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically find and apply discounts when you shop online!
Save money and earn rewards when you shop online. 

Add Coponz to your browser in seconds and shop like normal. We’ll pop up and do the work for you.

With one click, Coponz will automatically look for and apply coupons and promo codes to your cart. We’ll help you score some of the lowest prices on popular brands.
